// initialize the validator function validator.message.date = 'not a real date';
$('form') .on('blur', 'input[required], input.optional, select.required', validator.checkField) .on('change', 'select.required', validator.checkField) .on('keypress', 'input[required][pattern]', validator.keypress);
$('.multi.required').on('keyup blur', 'input', function() { validator.checkField.apply($(this).siblings().last()[0]); });
$('form').submit(function(e) { e.preventDefault(); var submit = true;
// evaluate the form using generic validaing if (!validator.checkAll($(this))) { submit = false; }
if (submit) this.submit();
return false; });
